html:
11.24.22  1:41 pm   i am confused, are cars people, or why are the self-owning cars in "Perfect." being driven by people, are they driving them illegally?

      i'm not sure, but it seems reasonably likely that the cars do not have people in them. further evidence is the fact that none of the cars have any doors

11.24.22  1:11 pm   is the shopping plaza in "Perfect." really based on a real location?

     yes

     it looks so.... "suburban-everywhere"... but more perfect. like, nobody bogarts the intersections. nice. also, there are no potholes!

in my hometown, the police station is falling into a giant sinkhole right now. do you think it's because the mountain is rebelling against human efforts to form flat areas (roads, etc.) on rolling terrain?

     that seems plausible

11.24.22  1:08 pm   when did you write the script for "Perfect."?

      november 1, 2022

11.24.22  12:46 pm   What's the best part of a toast to you?

      the center

11.24.22  12:18 pm   Why is c major such a cuddly chord :D

      it must have been played in a cuddly way

11.24.22  12:14 pm   Your recent video, "Perfect.", is really Perfect of a video. How the **** did you make it so perfect?

      i gave it just the right amount of imperfections

11.24.22  12:11 pm   Where did the guy in the checquered pants in 'Perfect.' get a megaphone?

      both characters have the same pants pattern, but i'm guessing the megaphone is from the snake shop

11.24.22  12:04 pm   Could you describe a plant if you had to?

      yes

11.24.22  11:51 am   Do you think about the concept of reality and the fallacies that time and space even could exist?

     i think the word 'exist' was born within time and space. so i think it's fine to say time and space exist. if you say it doesn't, then you'd have to say nothing does. but then why do we have the word...... if you want to say time and space doesn't "exist", then i think you'd need to graduate to a broader concept, other than 'exist'. because 'exist' already has a well established meaning within our world, and to suddenly change that to render the word totally meaningless would be a bit sneaky

     How did the universe start?

      i'm not sure

11.24.22  11:45 am   are you my 63rd cousin?

      maybe

11.24.22  11:42 am   why have 2 of your last 3 videos been set in outdoor shopping centres (at least to begin with)?

     i think only 1 is

     is this some subliminal messaging technique?

      i think the underlying message here is that shopping centers exist. and most people have probably seen them, or been there. so by showing them, i'm playing into that reality that most of us are familiar with

11.24.22  11:18 am   can your characters make asymmetrical facial expressions, such as winks, smirks, eyebrow raises?

     not with the current rigging, but it would be fairly easy to add that if i had to

     and what do you think about having their eyes kind of move to show that the characters are looking up, down, left, or right?

     i tried that before, but i think the effect you're describing would require pupils

     that's a nice compromise between turning their heads to look and having pupils, don't you think?

     i tried moving the eyes without pupils. it turns out, for that particular model, it's not effective. the actual head movement is much more effective

11.24.22  11:13 am   could you please tell us about your scriptwriting process and about any major "epiphanies" you've had in the past years?

     it was a breakthrough when i decided to start writing things with more than 1 character. a lot of fun to be had.

     what have you learned about storytelling?

     i'm gradually learning that i don't seem to do it the way most people seem to advise

     how's your experience been? how do you construct a narrative?

     the only way i know how to do it is to just start from the beginning and move forward, imaginatively if possible

     what made you first want to write skits of this sort?

     express things, ideas, situations, feelings,

     do you have any fiction recommendations?

     i just have my standard blanket recommendation, which is that i recommend everything

     [it's alright if you don't, just remove this portion (and any other questions you don't want to answer) from this question]

thank you

11.24.22  10:55 am   How did you start doing music?

Do you think i could start doing music (writing, singing, and playing) with a Yamaha synthesizer?

      i don't see why not

11.24.22  10:51 am   Do you like your videos

      i try to make them how i like

11.24.22  10:25 am   When people tell you to break a leg, is it because they hope you get into cast?

      no, but that's a good theory

11.24.22  10:15 am   could pizza end the world?

      no

11.24.22  9:55 am   how does the guy with a purple shirt in the newest video pull out the yell-o phone out of thin air

      that's the power of cinema

11.24.22  9:28 am   where do you get all of your song ideas from?

      the gutter. i have developed a vacuum device so now i don't even have to go into the gutter anymore, i can still get ideas from there

11.24.22  9:24 am   If the world doesn't end, is it ready to begin?

      that seems plausible

11.24.22  7:58 am   are the vehicle sounds in your latest video made with your mouth

      yes

11.24.22  7:55 am   is "out to lunch" set in the UK?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.24.22  7:45 am   is everything perfect?

      different things are perfect at different times

11.24.22  7:45 am   Does the world have reason to fear the state of ohio?

      it's too normal, which i understand might scare some people

11.24.22  7:10 am   when making music, do you just feel it out or is there some kind of academic knowledge involved

     academic knowledge does nothing for music

11.24.22  7:09 am   i don't know what to do

      finding out is the best part

11.24.22  4:24 am   Any opinion on colors?

      pretty good, as long as they don't fall into the wrong hands

11.24.22  3:47 am   Do you like knock knock jokes

      i like the part when the door opens

11.24.22  2:48 am   which questions do you prefer more; the long ones, or the short ones?

      i prefer a variety of lengths. my second choice is when they are all the same length

11.24.22  2:16 am   are the guys in perfect the same guys as the guys in 2 friends at the beach?

      almost, but not quite

11.24.22  1:12 am   Waffles or pancakes?

      ah, the classic cry of the person who has yet to discover waff cakes

11.24.22  12:41 am   should i try interpreting your videos

     sure

     or is it better off unexplained

     hopefully it can be good both ways

11.24.22  12:40 am   my friend recently asked me if he should buy himself some energy drinks. what do you think?

      sure. what could go wrong

11.24.22  12:30 am   are beds and couches just different versions of the same thing

      they are similar versions of a different thing

11.24.22  12:15 am   does the guy in your new video really own every car in the parking lot?

      not the 2 that were engaged in conflict at the beginning

11.23.22  11:22 pm   Will the team with the most points win?

      no but they will have the feeling of a job well done

11.23.22  11:19 pm   do you ever look at any of these submitted questions and think "wow that is a stupid question

      no, that's because they are all smart

11.23.22  10:48 pm   are you a big thanksgiver

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.23.22  10:19 pm   Do you have a favorite letter?

      no

11.23.22  9:43 pm   i make instrumental music but i dont play any instruments. i sing but dont make songs with vocals/words. how do i fix this?

     try fixing everything besides that

     does it even need fixing? 

     maybe not

11.23.22  9:39 pm   I grew up where your "perfect." video is shot. how did you pick that place?

      it was a random selection, and i wrote the entire video after making the selection. the location inspired the video

11.23.22  9:37 pm   If the world is perfect, should you change it?

      of course

11.23.22  9:36 pm   What's the production process been like for your recent non-music videos?

      dreamy

11.23.22  9:23 pm   why aren't I named charles

      because that would give you too many life advantages, and then you might self-destruct in the wake of your whirlwind of success and good fortune

11.23.22  9:22 pm   The cymbals that play during the line "well how about down the street" sound exactly the same as the ones from the end of "ball & stick". Is this intentional?

      i was having a corn ball moment

11.23.22  9:11 pm   in the "Perfect." video, one of the stores is just called "DRAMA".

     that's just the abreviated name

      what is the drama store?

     it appears to be a liquor store

      what do they sell?

     liquor and wine

     is it drama? or do they sell things that cause drama within the local community?

     i guess that depends how 'responsibly' you are able to use it

11.23.22  9:05 pm   what colour is the colour pink? i just can't figure it out

      it's red with a little bit of blue in it

11.23.22  8:48 pm   Why is the letter "W" pronounced "double u" when most of the time it looks like a double V?

      because U used to look like V

11.23.22  8:25 pm   Do you have a harmonica?

      no

11.23.22  8:24 pm   How do some of the cars in "perfect" have the ability to drive to the moon?

      i don't think any of them can. but now that i think about it i realize they all could. that's the power of fiction
